---
title: "Stat Mania Docs"
---

This websites mainly contains lectures slides and questions on statistics. It also contains some useful code snippets, covering linux command line, git, spreadsheet, among others.

All the lectures are made using [R programming language](https://www.r-project.org/) inside [Rstudio IDE](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/). The presentations were made using the [revealjs](https://revealjs.com/) package.

Questions are made using $\LaTeX$ inside Rstudio.

## How to Use

- Press `space` or down-arrow ($\downarrow$) to go the next slide or see hidden contents.
- Press up-arrow ($\uparrow$) or `P` to go the previous slide.
- Press right arrow or left arrow to see next/previous chapter

See more [here](https://defkey.com/reveal-js-shortcuts)
